sentence: The panel subpoenaed two other officials Michael Roman and Gary Michael Brown the director and deputy director, respectively, of Election Day Operations for Trump's 2020 reelection campaign.
title: Jan. 6 panel targets key players in false Trump elector strategy

sentence: In its statement, the committee said Trump's campaign director, Michael A. Roman, and deputy director, Gary Michael Brown, took part in efforts to "promote allegations of fraud in the November 2020 election and encourage state legislators to appoint false 'alternate' slates of electors."
author: Daniel Uria
title: Jan. 6 committee issues subpoenas seeking information on alternate elector plots

sentence: Key Facts Michael Roman and G. Michael Brown, who served as top officials on Trump's 2020 campaign, were both given subpoenas.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Trump Campaign Officials Over Fake Electors Scheme
